GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A ~y~stolen bike has been spotted~w~, pull over the rider.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~You:~w~ Hi there. Is it okay if I ask you a few questions?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Sure, go on. But watch that traffic behind you. Watch out!
~b~You:~w~ Hi there. Can we have a conversation about that bike?
~r~Suspect:~w~ What about it?
~b~You:~w~ It has been reported stolen, today infact.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Oh, haha. Sorry, I reported it! I thought I'd lost it, but I found it!
~b~You:~w~ I see, so this bike is registered to you?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yep, absolutely. Run all the checks you need.
~b~You:~w~ Hi there. The reason I'm speaking to you is because of that bike.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm trying to get somewhere. The tire isn't flat or anthing. What's wrong?
~b~You:~w~ Yesterday it was reported stolen.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Oh. Uhh, that is odd.
~b~You:~w~ You wouldn't know why would you?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Uh...yes! I completely forgot I had reported it stolen.
~b~You:~w~ Hi there. Could we have a little chat about that bike?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Okay.
~b~You:~w~ On our records it has recently been reported stolen.
~r~Suspect:~w~ ...
~b~You:~w~ Sorry, what was that?
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm not commenting on the matter.
~r~Suspect:~w~ ARRRRGGGHH! NOT YOU!
